{"id":984260445,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1688271979,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"88 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/984260445/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Even Odd Subarray With Threshold","memory":"91.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int longestAlternatingSubarray(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int cnt=0,f=0,ans=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            if(f==0&&nums[i]<=k&&nums[i]%2==0&&cnt==0){\n                cnt++;\n                f=1;\n            }\n           else if(cnt!=0){\n                if(cnt%2!=0){\n                    if(nums[i]%2!=0&&nums[i]<=k)cnt++;\n                    else{cnt=0;\n                        f=0;\n                         if(f==0&&nums[i]<=k&&nums[i]%2==0&&cnt==0){\n                cnt++;\n                f=1;\n            } \n                    }\n                }else{\n                    if(nums[i]%2==0&&nums[i]<=k)cnt++;\n                    else{cnt=0;\n                        f=0;\n                    } \n                }\n            }\n            ans=max(ans,cnt);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-even-odd-subarray-with-threshold","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
